info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 2:47PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Meade, eastern Lawrence and central Pennington Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 246 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Piedmont, or 12 miles northwest of Rapid City, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rapid City, Black Hawk, Summerset, Nemo, Piedmont and Dalton Lake. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 42 and 56. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large quantities of small hail. Driving through deep hail is like driving on slushy roads. Slow down and do not brake suddenly.
